title: Syntax highlighting support for the IntelliJ IDEA IDE
body:
by **alexander.orlov@loxal.net**: 
Many ppl including use IntelliJ IDEA as a general purpose IDE. Also I write not only my
Java code but also my Go code in this IDE. Actually I already made a custom language
configuration and definition file for IntelliJ...

Also:
I've signed the CLA 1.1.
Cloned the Google's Go repo
And Pushed the configuration file to my cloned repo:
http://code.google.com/r/alexanderorlov-contrib/source/detail?r=5e90b4b749c19ac1fec2231af022f35bf8543c7b
